title: Get Started on a Health Goal
text: With the help of the information you have provided, Digital Health Coach would like to recommend the top 3 health goals you should consider working on. Choose based on which goal really interests and motivates you. When you’ve decided, click the “Get Started” button next to your selected goal and Digital Health Coach will add it to your plan. Digital Health Coach suggests focusing on one goal at a time.
